metadata.title: CVE-2023-28486 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Sudo before 1.9.13 does not escape control characters in log messages.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28486` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sudo - 1.8.16-0ubuntu1.10+esm2
sudo-ldap - 1.8.16-0ubuntu1.10+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: sudo package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.16-0ubuntu1.10+esm2').
